DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Consent Withdrawn Witness Confirmation Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of witness confirmation of participant's withdrawal of consent for participation in the Quality of Life portion of the study represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Quality of Life Consent Withdrawn Witness Confirmation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._When the permission to do something is rescinded or withdrawn._To attest to the genuineness of a document or signature._Having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3783584 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
